STRING.LIMIT: The Length Cannot Be Less Than %0 Digit
STRING.UNEQUAL: Length Is Not Equal To %0 Digit
STRING.AMOUNT_MAX: Bit Integer Amount Of Up To %0 Yards
STRING.CUSTOM02: Do Not Enter Symbols Or Non-Chinese English Numbers
STRING.DoubleByte: Only Full Chinese And English Numbers
STRING.OnlyHalfChar: Text Can Be Entered Only Halves
STRING.TWD_SUBJECT: Domestic Target Cannot Choose Foreign Currency

NUMBER.moneyIntMaxLength: Bit Integer Amount Of Up To %0 Yards
NUMBER.moneyIntMinLength: The Decimal Field Of The Amount Is Up To %0 Digits
NUMBER.NUMBER_ZERO_TO_NINE: You Click The Digital Value Other Than 0 ~ 9

DATE.MIN_TODAY: Date Must Not Be Greater Than Today
DATE.CUSTOM02: 【Query Date To Date】Must Not Be Blank!
DATE.CUSTOM04: 【Date Of Inquiry】Shall Not Be Less Than The First Query Date!
DATE.CUSTOM05: 【Date Of Inquiry】Must Be Less Than Or Equal to【Query Date To Date】!
DATE.CUSTOM06: 【Query Date to Date】Cannot Be Greater Than The System Day!
DATE.CUSTOM07: Query Date Have Exceeded The Set Range!!
DATE.MIN_SYSDATE: Date Not Be Less Than The System Day %0
DATE.MAX_SYSDATE: Date Not Be Greater Than The System Day %0

PHONE.AREA: Area Code Does Not Meet The Rules
PHONE.LENGTH: Length Does Not Meet The Rules
PHONE.EXTEN: Extension Number Does Not Meet The Rules

PHONE.LOANM11: Enter The Correct Phone Format,EX:0912345678,Please Re-enter

CARD.ACNT: Enter The Correct Bank Account Number
CARD.CARDNUM: Enter A Valid Credit Card Number

PSWD.ERROR: 8-12 alphanumeric characters and symbols, including at least two alphanumeric characters, and are case sensitive and cannot be the same as the user code.
PSWD.SAMECUST: New connection can not be set the same password and ID number.
PSWD.SAMECUST_2: New connection password cannot be set to be the same as the last 9 digits of the ID number.
PSWD.SAMECONNID: New connection can not be set the same password to connect Code
PSWD.SAMEOLD: The new connection can not be set the same password old password
PSWD.SAMECHECK: The new password and confirm the new password to connect different
PSWD.LOGINGCHECK: Enter a password or alphanumeric symbols
PSWD.CONTINUE: The new connection password cannot be set to continuous characters and numbers
PSWD.SAMEALL: The new connection password cannot be set to all the same  characters and numbers
PSWD.TWOENG: The new connection password must contain at least 2 English characters
PSWD.MAXLEN: Password must be no longer than 12 characters
PSWD.ERRORLEN: The new connection password cannot be less than 8 codes or more than 12 codes

SSL.OLDERROR: Old SSL Password Format Is Wrong
SSL.NOTSAME: The new SSL transfer different password and confirm new password Re-enter the SSL transfer
SSL.SAME_USERDATA: The new SSL transfer different password and confirm new password Re-enter the SSL transfer.
SSL.NOENGLISH: SSL transfer new password must contain at least two words in English and is case sensitive, please try again.
SSL.ERROR: SSL transfer new password must be 8-16 alphanumeric characters, please re-enter

CONNID.SAMEOLD: 新舊連線代號不得相同
